info.title: Schema of SignalRService events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the SignalRService events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

SignalRServiceClientConnectionConnectedE.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.SignalRService.ClientConnectionConnected event.

timestamp.description: The time at which the event occurred.

hubName.description: The hub of connected client connection.

connectionId.description: The connection Id of connected client connection.

userId.description: The user Id of connected client connection.

SignalRServiceClientConnectionDisconnect.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.SignalRService.ClientConnectionDisconnected event.

timestamp.description: The time at which the event occurred.

hubName.description: The hub of connected client connection.

connectionId.description: The connection Id of connected client connection.

userId.description: The user Id of connected client connection.

errorMessage.description: The message of error that cause the client connection disconnected.
